library(tidyverse)

## Problem 1

Create a data frame with specific elements

```{r}
prob1_df = 
  tibble(
    samp = rnorm(10),
    samp_gt_10 = samp > 0,
    char_vec = c("a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "f", "g", "h", "i", "j"),
    factor_vec = factor(c("low", "low", "low", "mod", "mod", "mod", "mod", "high", "high", "high"))
)
```
